name: XGRA: Extreme G Racing Association
summary:
XGRA: Extreme-G Racing Association is a futuristic racing video game, and the fourth in the Extreme-G series, following Extreme-G 3. This game features more tracks as well as a brand new weapon system.
Gameplay is similar but slightly different to previous games in the series. XGRA features a wide range of riders, tracks and bikes that can accelerate at an incredibly rapid rate, going from 0 to 300 mph in a matter of seconds. A returning feature is the ability to break sound barrier: upon reaching 750MPH, all sound effects will cut out, except for item collection sound, other tider's taunts, weapons firing, and in-game music.

XGRA allows players to race for 8 different teams, with each team's bike having their own advantages and drawbacks such as Regeneration, Handling, Speed, Acceleration and Shielding.

name: XG Blast!
summary: XG Blast! is an arcade shooter delivered in a bright and colorful retro style. Players control the spaceship Aknathen, which wandered into hostile territory during a secret experimental journey to test the spaceship's capabilities and advanced devices. Utilize the unique powers of your ship as you fight countless squadrons of enemy ships. It is up to you to get your crew back in one piece and save your people from annihilation!

name: XGun-Weapon Evolution
summary: XGun is a massive multiplayer online game. It has more than 37 kinds of weapons, 26 skills your are free to choose , a unique evolutionary system and a big battlefield. All you have to do is to gain new way to fight and try to survive in this world of chaos!

name: X-Games: Pro Boarder
summary:
X-Games: Pro Boarder is a snowboarding game with several game modes including downhill and half pipe.

In downhill mode the player's mission is to get down as quickly as possible, also grinding on several objects like cars and airplanes that have been placed in the scenery.

In half pipe mode the player must travel from the beginning to the end of the pipe doing stunts on the left and the right, finishing before the time reaches zero having as many points as possible.

name: X: Gold
summary: X-Gold is a compilation that contains X: Beyond the Frontier and its expansion pack X-Tension.

name: X-Girl: Cyber Punk Adventure
summary: Pornographic S&M game developed by RedZone in 1996. Set in wartime Japan in the not-so-distant future, the player takes control of a female interrogation officer who tracks down escaped criminals.

name: XGamer: AI Revolution
summary: XGAMER - AI Revolution is a sci-fi third-person RPG game. In the main world, it is divided into 4+1 areas, the first 4 areas are: phantom, earth, void and heat. Each core has 20 programs. Find out The Key is. By getting to know The Key and finding the world code, you will know the truth.

name: XGA
summary: This is a Metroidvania aiming to continue Metroid Fusion's focus on horror and the SA-X. Explore a huge, interconnected space station, fighting various monsters, upgrades and boss battles. Avoid XGA as getting caught means certain death....

name: X-Gravity
summary: Defy physics with insane skateboarding combos across a reality-breaking open-world cityscape in X-GRAVITY! Rack up views, blaze through missions with a crew of freaky aliens, and carve your path with a fully customizable skater.
